Addon.name: API Design Block

Field.Name: name
Field.Caption: Name
Field.HelpDefault: Optional name for this block. Does not appear on the public site.

Field.Name: typeid
Field.Caption: Extension Type
Field.HelpDefault: Select the type of page extention. Choose Page and the content will be different for every page. Choose Section and the content will be different for each section.

Field.Name: addonid
Field.Caption: Addon
Field.HelpDefault: Select the Design Block to run here.

Field.Name: styleheight
Field.Caption: Height (with units)
Field.HelpDefault: Optional. Set a style height and the design block will be forced this this height. Include both the number and the units, like 500px or 20em.

Field.Name: fontstyleid
Field.Caption: Font
Field.HelpDefault: Optional. Select a font to override the site's theme.

Field.Name: themestyleid
Field.Caption: Theme
Field.HelpDefault: Optional. Select a custom theme to override the site's theme.

Field.Name: padtop
Field.Caption: Top Padding
Field.HelpDefault: Add space between the edge of the block and the content.

Field.Name: padright
Field.Caption: Right Padding
Field.HelpDefault: Add space between the edge of the block and the content.

Field.Name: padbottom
Field.Caption: Bottom Padding
Field.HelpDefault: Add space between the edge of the block and the content.

Field.Name: padleft
Field.Caption: Left Padding
Field.HelpDefault: Add space between the edge of the block and the content.

Field.Name: backgroundimagefilename
Field.Caption: Background Image
Field.HelpDefault: Add a background image to the design block. It will be reduced in size to cover the entire background.

Field.Name: asfullbleed
Field.Caption: Use as Full Bleed
Field.HelpDefault: When not checked, this design block should be used within a container. When checked, the block is expected to span the full width of the screen and may create its own container.
